name: Iberian Bee Database
description: Bees are a diverse group with more than 1000 species described in the Iberian Peninsula. This is a collaborative effort to collate and curate a database of bee occurrences.

variableMeasured.name: Genus
variableMeasured.description: Genus

variableMeasured.name: Subgenus
variableMeasured.description: Subgenus

variableMeasured.name: Species
variableMeasured.description: Species

variableMeasured.name: Subspecies
variableMeasured.description: Subspecies

variableMeasured.name: Country
variableMeasured.description: Country of collection

variableMeasured.name: Province
variableMeasured.description: Province of collection

variableMeasured.name: Locality
variableMeasured.description: Locality as provided by original collectors

variableMeasured.name: Latitude
variableMeasured.description: Latitude

variableMeasured.description: Longitude

variableMeasured.name: Coordinate.precision
variableMeasured.description: Precision at which the coordinates are provided

variableMeasured.name: Year
variableMeasured.description: Year of collection

variableMeasured.name: Month
variableMeasured.description: Month of collection

variableMeasured.name: Day
variableMeasured.description: Day of collection

variableMeasured.name: Start.date
variableMeasured.description: Free text regarding earlier posible date of collection

variableMeasured.name: End.date
variableMeasured.description: Free text regarding later posible date of collection

variableMeasured.name: Collector
variableMeasured.description: Name of the collector

variableMeasured.name: Determined.by
variableMeasured.description: Name of the person who identified the specimen

variableMeasured.name: Female
variableMeasured.description: Number of females recorded (including queens in social spcies)

variableMeasured.name: Male
variableMeasured.description: Number of males recorded

variableMeasured.name: Worker
variableMeasured.description: Number of workers recorded (for social species)

variableMeasured.name: Not.specified
variableMeasured.description: Number of specimens recorded without sex identification

variableMeasured.name: Reference.doi
variableMeasured.description: If the data is publiched, the DOI of the papers where it appears

variableMeasured.name: Flowers.visited
variableMeasured.description: Free text including the flowers that the specimen was visiting

variableMeasured.name: Local_ID
variableMeasured.description: Unique identification in the local collection

variableMeasured.name: Authors.to.give.credit
variableMeasured.description: List of authors providing the original dataset

variableMeasured.name: Any.other.additional.data
variableMeasured.description: Free text to note any other additional information

variableMeasured.name: Notes.and.queries
variableMeasured.description: Free text to note any other notes or queries

variableMeasured.name: uid
variableMeasured.description: Unique identification in IBD.

variableMeasured.name: original_name
variableMeasured.description: Species name as provided by the orignal dataset

variableMeasured.name: accepted_name
variableMeasured.description: Final species name after correcting for misspellings and synonims
